mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL, C.CMT_NO, C.CMT_CONTENT, C.CMT_CREATE_DT, C.PARENT_CMT_NO, C.CMT_STAT, C.CREATOR , E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_PROFILE FROM COMMENT_T C INNER JOIN BOARD_T B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON C.CREATOR = E.EMP_NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} START WITH PARENT_CMT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CMT_NO = PARENT_CMT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY CMT_NO ASC
SELECT C.CMT_NO, C.CMT_CONTENT, C.CMT_STAT, C.CREATOR FROM COMMENT_T C WHERE C.CMT_NO = ${cmtNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT_T C SET C.CMT_STAT = 1, C.MODIFIER = #{modifier}, C.MODIFY_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHERE C.CMT_NO = #{cmtNo}
